channel.title: Brezhnev on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Brezhnev on Rusland 1

item.title: Russian New Year (Новый год) and the First Encounter
item.description: Begin = continuation Linked to New Year is a Russian saying (in the realm of superstition ) that can sound both motivating and ominous. Как встретишь Новый год (How you begin/meet the New Year), так его и проведёшь (is how it will go).

item.title: State Funeral
item.description: Monty Pythonesque, reported de Volkskrant , but close to historical reality. Quite high praise for a film featuring supposed Russians speaking English. State Funeral Much more interesting and far closer to historical reality is State Funeral (2019, in Russian Государственные Похороны), by Ukrainian director Sergei Loznitsa .
